name: Torchero
description:
Intro

Made during Ludum Dare 50!

Survive the Hord in the Darkness by using torches to illuminate the surroundings.

Use the Axe to harvest Trees and to gain torches. Destroy the Skulls that are spawning the hord of enemies. Collect Expierience to develop your character. Find or unlock Items to make it easier!

Meele attacks dont have cooldowns, so dont try to destroy your keyboard or gamepad!

Sound Effects are mainly from Itch.IO Some of them are from https://www.zapsplat.com/ 

Music is all done by ourselfs by the mighty Lampda

Keybinds

W = North

S = South

A = West

D = East

Space / X (Left) Button = Attack / Use

1 - 9 / Scroll Wheel / Dpad = Items in Inventory

Left Controller Stick = Movement
